facts: The Cost of Living Adjustment (COLA) takes effect in January
It is set based on the rate of inflation

neutral.headline: Cost-of-Living Boost for Veterans and Military Retirees Set to Begin in January, Based on Inflation Rate
neutral.body_html: The Cost of Living Adjustment (COLA) is set to take effect in January. This annual increase will be based on the rate of inflation as determined by economic indicators.

conservative.headline: Veterans and Military Retirees Set for COLA Increase Based on Current Economic Indicators
conservative.body_html: The Cost of Living Adjustment (COLA) is set to take effect in January. This annual increase will be based on the rate of inflation as determined by economic indicators.

liberal.headline: 2026 COLA Boost for Veterans and Military Retirees Reflects Inflation Rate, Ensuring Fair Compensation
